title: Ask the Friend for Love
description: 2010-12-08 - Prayer, when cultivated consciously, energizes and guides us on the spiritual path. This talk investigates the difference between wanting, with it's narrow fixation, and the prayer that arises out of our deep heart's longing.  We explore how living prayer, the prayer that arises from consciously inhabiting longing, can carry us home to loving presence.  As John O'Donahue writes, prayer is the bridge between longing and belonging. Please support this podcast by donating at www.tarabrach.com or www.imcw.org. Thank you!
